service.title: Home Documents
service.documentation: This document proposes a "home document" format for non-browser HTTP clients.

document.title: Home Documents (JSON)
document.documentation: This document proposes a "home document" format for non-browser HTTP clients.

vocabulary.title: The Home Document JSON Vocabulary
vocabulary.documentation: A JSON Home Document uses the format described in RFC 4627 and has the media type "application/json-home". Its content consists of a root object with a "resources" property, whose member names are link relation types (as defined by RFC 5988), and values are Resource Objects, defined below.
